MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:45pm due to an underground cable fault near Almond Square and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:31am on 12 November 2020
